title: Rogers BISCO Silicone
content: Custom Rogers BISCO Silicone Gaskets and Seals For Superior Performance.fullframe {    height: 500px;    padding-bottom: 86px;}Full Line of Cellular, Solid and Specialty BISCO Materials, produced in roll stock to be fabricated into:GasketsHeat shieldsFire stopsSealsCushionsInsulation for a wide variety of applicationsBISCO Silicone Foams For Superior PerformanceResistant to temperature extremesResistant to UVResistant to ozoneExtremely resilient to mechanical fatigueExcellent compression-set and creep resistanceMeets the most stringent UL flame ratingsBISCO Products Offer Exceptional Heat Insulating PropertiesEnormously versatile and always in demand, Rogers’ collection of silicone materials has been specifically developed for use in a wide range of heat shielding and insulating applications. Silicone materials are well known as thermal and electrical insulators as well as useful for gasketing, cushioning, and sealing. We stock a variety of silicone products that can be used for a variety of applications.BISCO Silicone Solutions for a Range of Production ChallengeFrom ultra soft silicone foam, which allows designers to use less force to seal enclosures and still protect their device from the environment, to extra firm silicone that offers excellent memory and low stress relaxation, which reduces maintenance costs associated with gasket failures due to compression set and softening.BISCO For a Variety of IndustriesOur customers include companies involved in the automotive, safety and security, HVAC, and aerospace industries, as well as a number of other industries that require the dependability and exceptional performance BISCO products can bring. Competitively priced and formulated to comply with a range of national and international legislation, we offer a premium solution that can be easily adapted to your specific requirements.SRP: A Rogers Corporation Preferred ConverterSRP is proud to be a Rogers Corporation Preferred Converter for their line of PORON Polyurethane and BISCO Silicone materials. We provide distribution and converting of these materials to various industries and customers around the world. Being a Preferred Converter for Rogers provides us access to all Rogers materials, with the added benefit of discounts and favorable lead times. SRP converts these materials into custom gaskets, seals, pads and stripping. All products can be laminated with a pressure sensitive adhesive.
description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation. We fabricate BISCO silicone materials into custom gaskets, heat shields, and seals.

seo.title: Rogers BISCO Silicone
seo.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation. We fabricate BISCO silicone materials into custom gaskets, heat shields, and seals.

gaskets.title: BISCO HT-800 Silicone Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including BISCO HT-800 Medium Cellular Silicone. HT-800 is a versatile, medium silicone foam that combines the lightness of foam with the enhanced sealing capabilities of traditional sponge rubber.Its shelf life, flame resistance and weatherability makes HT-800 the material of choice for:sealing and protecting outdoor communication equipmentsealing and protecting electronic and lighting enclosuresIt’s also widely used in rail and mass transit equipment.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO HT-800 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO HT-820 Silicone Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including BISCO HT-820 Firm Cellular Silicone. BISCO HT-820 is a firm grade silicone foam that provides enhanced durability and sealing. BISCO HT-820 foam offers a higher tear and tensile strength than our lighter grade foams. This material is designed for use in enclosures requiring a more durable, high closure force gasket.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO HT-820 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO HT-840 Silicone Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, and includes BISCO HT-840. BISCO HT-840  is a very firm grade silicone foam that offers superior sealing capabilities. BISCO HT-840 silicone provides a higher tear and tensile strength than our lighter grade foams. BISCO HT-840 silicone is designed for use in enclosures requiring a more durable, high closure force gasket.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO HT-840 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO HT-870 Silicone Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including BISCO HT-870. BISCO HT-870 is a soft silicone and is ideal for sealing outdoor enclosures, protecting electronics from shock and heat and providing cushioning and vibration isolation.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO HT-870 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO HT-1200 Silicone Rubber
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including the BISCO HT-1200 general purpose solid silicone series. BISCO HT-1200 silicone rubber offers resistance to high temperatures, tear, and most fluids for a variety of industrial applications. BISCO HT-1200 is compliant with A-A-59588, AMS 3301-3304, and FDA 21 CFR 177.2600.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO HT-1200 silicone rubber into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO HT-6000 Solid Silicones
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including the BISCO HT-6000 series of performance solid silicones that are ideal for high demand gasketing applications. They provide low compression set (<5%), high tear strength, resistance to fluids and extremely tight thickness tolerances.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO HT-6000 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO BF-1000 Silicone Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, which includes BISCO BF-1000 Extra Soft Cellular Silicone.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO BF-1000 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO BF-2000 Silicone Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, which includes the BISCO BF-2000. BISCO BF-2000 silicone foam in an ultra soft, highly compressible silicone foam with the right combination of low weight and softness for applications requiring low closure force and dust sealing.
gaskets.description: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including BISCO BF-2000 Silicone Foam.

gaskets.title: BISCO EC-2130 Silicone EMI Shields
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including their BISCO EC-2130 electrically conductive silicones. These materials reduce EMI and RFI at frequencies above 10 GHz in a wide range of electronic applications.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO EC-2130 silicone into custom shields.

gaskets.title: BISCO RS-700 Silicone Sponge
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including BISCO RS-700 series of closed cell silicone sponges. BISCO RS-700 is designed to perform in conditions that require a gasket with extra strength and durability.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO RS-700 silicone into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: BISCO Flame Resistant Silicones
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s BISCO Silicone materials since 1999, including BISCO Flame Resistant Sponge Silicone.  These materials meet various flame ratings and specifications, and are available in three grades: soft, medium and firm.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for BISCO Silicone materials, and can convert BISCO flame resistant silicone into custom gaskets and shields.
